column4: I need some motivation to continue using ubuntu I use my pc for graphics and development as well as running my business so the usual stuff. I am tired of the compatibility issues, do you guys use Ubuntu for graphic development and web design
just dual boot, use windows offline only for design and ubuntu for everything else
graphic design, i could us gimp, web develpoment - vim and firefox (basically raw writing no wysiwyg)
dreamweaver sucks anyway imo, its just way to bloated to be efficient
